1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj Asaf.</e> <pb/><t>A Jehová, Dios Axon̈ejochi, a ix loloni. Ix yavtej eb' cajan d'a yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic, b'aj sjavi c'u masanto b'aj tz'em c'u.</t>
2: <t>A d'a tzalan Sion, aton chon̈ab' te vach' yilji, ata' sch'ox saquilq'uinal Dios.</t>
3: <t>Tic sja co Diosal, palta man̈ ichn̈ejoctalaj ol javoc. A d'a spatic yichan̈ ay jun c'ac' to satumeli yed' jun chacxuxum ic'.</t>
4: <t>Ato d'a chaan̈ tz'avtaj eb' aj satchaan̈ yed' eb' cajan d'a sat lum luum tic yuj Dios, yic vach' syil eb' sch'olb'itaj schon̈ab'.</t>
5: <t>Syal Dios icha tic: Molb'ejec e b'a ex vicxo, a ex eyac'nac jun silab' d'ayin, ayic eyac'annac e trato ved'oc, xchi.</t>
6: <t>A satchaan̈ sch'oxani to a Dios Juez ton d'a stojolal.</t>
7: <t>Syalanpax Dios icha tic: Ex in chon̈ab' Israel, ab'ecnab'i, jichan ol vutej valanoch e paltail d'a e sat. A in Dios in, e Diosal in.</t>
8: <t>Maj ex in tumejlaj yuj eyofrenda tzeyac'taxon d'ayin yed' noc' noc' tze n̈us silab'il d'ayin d'a valtar.</t>
9: <t>Max in c'anlaj noc' quelemtac vacax molb'il eyuuj. Malaj noc' mam chiva d'a yol e macte' tzin c'an d'ayex.</t>
10: <t>Vicn̈ej masanil noc' caltacte'al noc', vic pax noc' molb'etzal noc' ay d'a jolomtac vitz.</t>
11: <t>Vic masanil noc' much ay d'a caltac te' yed' masanil tas tz'ec' d'a cal vayumtac.</t>
12: <t>Q'uinaloc ay in vejel, man̈ ol val-laj d'ayex, yujto vic jun yolyib'an̈q'uinal tic yed' masanil tas ay d'ay.</t>
13: <t>¿Tocval a sb'ac'chil noc' vacax tzin chi'a? ¿Tocval a pax schiq'uil noc' mam chiva svuq'uej?</t>
14: <t>A silab' tzin nib'ej, to tzeyac' yuj diosal d'ayin, tzeyaq'uelc'och tas tzeyaltej d'ayin, a in ton ec' in to d'a yib'an̈ smasanil.</t>
15: <t>Ayic ay eyaelal, avtejinec, ol ex in colo', a exxo ol in eyic'chaan̈, xchi Dios.</t>
16: <t>Axo d'a eb' chuc sb'eyb'al, syal Dios icha tic: ¿Toc ay eyalan eyic eyalanel in c'ayb'ub'al, ma eyalanel yab'ixal in trato?</t>
17: <t>Ina to max yal-laj e c'ool tzex in cacha', malaj yelc'och in lolonel d'ayex.</t>
18: <t>Ayic sja vin̈ elc'umtaxoni, tzex q'ue urnaj e b'at yed' vin̈. Te vach' eyac'anpax yed' eb' sc'ulan ajmulal.</t>
19: <t>Palta a tas tze c'ulej, to tze naq'ue lolonel, max ex och vaan eyesani.</t>
20: <t>A d'a eb' eyuc'tac junn̈ej e nun yed'oc, tzeyal chucal lolonel d'a spatic eb'.</t>
21: <t>Ayic ix e c'ulan juntzan̈ chucal tic, malaj tas svala'. Yuj chi' tze na' to lajan in eyed'oc, palta ol valoch e mul chi' d'a e sat, ol vil-lajoch in sat eyed'oc.</t>
22: <t>A ex tzin b'at satc'olal eyuuj tic, vach'ocab' tz'aj snachajel jun tic eyuuj, axo talaj tz'aji, ol ex in jatchitejb'ati, man̈xalaj mach ol ex colan d'ayin.</t>
23: <t>A mach tz'ac'an yuj diosal d'ayin, ay velc'och d'a yol sat. A mach tzin c'anab'ajani, ol in colcaneli, xchi Dios.</t>
